subject: Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Dementia
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Football
lead_paragraph: Players in the category would receive up to $1.5 million, knowing that if they develop full-blown dementia they can receive as much as $1.5 million more.
